fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Culture and media, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society, Sport, Borders and Security, Communication

subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: The MEDIAPRO Group is the leading technical services supplier to the audiovisual sector. The company produces and distributes audiovisual content, administers and distributes sporting events, is a film and interactive content producer and supplier of post-production services. The following services also constitute a fundamental part of the MEDIAPRO Group's activities: technical engineering, transmission services, communications and marketing consultancy and advertising trading as well as the design and post-production services for themed television channels. The staff and technical resources at MEDIAPRO are spearheading innovation within the European audiovisual sector.
relevant_communication: Monitorizar la actividad de las comisiones legislativas, organización y asistencia a eventos sobre las materias arriba indicadas, establecer relaciones con representantes públicos y funcionarios.
